user.finder.appointment.back-link: Back to selection of vaccination site
user.finder.appointment.info: Based on the information provided about the person to be vaccinated, vaccination with {vaccine} is recommended according to current recommendations. This will be taken into account in the proposed dates.
user.finder.appointment.title: Appointments
user.finder.location.accessible.label: Only barrier-free vaccination sites
user.finder.location.intro: Choose from the available options where you would like to be vaccinated.

user.finder.success.additional-preparati: Plan and organize arrival and return
Allow time for <0>follow-up</0>.<1/><2>(approximately 15 minutes, or slightly longer if necessary for certain preexisting conditions)</2>

Think about your own <0>disease history</0> <1>(for example, allergies, fainting spells)</1> so that you can share it with the doctor when you receive the vaccine and weigh possible risks of vaccination.
You can take the following additional steps to prepare for your vaccination appointment:

user.finder.success.cancelation-confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the booked appointment?
user.finder.success.notice-cancelation: If you are unable to keep your appointment, please cancel it using the button below.
user.finder.success.notice-code: Please make a note of the code below and be sure to bring it with you to your vaccination.
user.finder.success.notification.booking: Unfortunately the booking could not be found

user.finder.verify.intro: This is your selected appointment. Please check carefully that everything is correct.<0/> You can then finalise your booking.

user.login.intro: Here you can check your vaccination status
user.login.notification.error: There is an error in your registration

user.logout.intro: Do you really want to unsubscribe? Please make sure that you have noted down your data key. Only with it you can log in again.
user.logout.title: Log out
user.questionaire.error.default: Your last vaccination must be more. Please understand the current rules. These may change, stay informed.
user.welcome.form_error: Please answer all questions, otherwise we will not be able to find appointments for you. All your personal data will only be stored on your personal device and will not be transmitted or passed on to a server.
user.welcome.intro-1: You are now only a few clicks away from your appointment.
user.welcome.intro-2: We will ask you a few questions so you can get the right vaccine. The data remains on your device and is not transmitted.
user.welcome.question0_error: Unfortunately, vaccinations for under-5s are not currently available
user.welcome.question0_value: How old are you or the person to be vaccinated?
user.welcome.question2_error: It must be 3 months since your last vaccination appointment before you can receive a booster.
user.welcome.question2_value: Was your last vaccination more than 3 months ago?
user.welcome.question3_value: Are you younger than 30 or pregnant?
user.welcome.question4_error: Unfortunately, appointments for child vaccinations are not (yet) offered via the portal. We will try to expand the offer as soon as possible and ask for your patience until then.
user.welcome.question5_error: Unfortunately, there are currently (still) no appointments for children under 5 years via the portal. We are trying to expand the offer as soon as possible and ask for your patience until then.
user.welcome.title: Welcome!
